name: The Tale of Torith
description:
The Tale of Torith is the first Unity game I made as a college assignment. It's only one level because that's all we had to do but I tried to make it as interesting as I could. Since it's my first game I know it's not perfect but I hope that anyone who comes across it finds some enjoyment in it!

Thanks for playing!

Controls:

A - Move left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Dash

Left Click - Attack
